::Battera::

She looked down.  She could tell that this maximal wasn't about to 
trust her. "It's not an ambush.  But how can all the leaders talk if 
they are not all face to face with one another."  She sighed.  "Look. 
If the leader would go to the talks," she paused, seh felt like she 
had no choice,"I will stay as insureance.  Your leader gows to the 
talk and I will stay here. If anything happens to him, you may kill 
me."
She looked Rex dead in the eyes.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Rex::
> 
> Rex frowns, looking at Battera. "Allright, so let me get this 
straight," he 
> says, grabbing yet another fruit, "A 'very special' Pred is hosting 
a peace 
> meeting. I assume his crew also consists of Predacons. The 
Predacon, 
> Alliance, and Maximal commanders are to be present there."
> 
> His eyes narrow as his mind jumps to the worst conclusion. "Sounds 
like an 
> ambush to me."
